content: The center in the game of chess, formed by the e4, e5, d4, and d5 squares, has exceptional strategic importance. Whoever has a strong center will always have an advantage in carrying out both attack and defense operations.
translations: ita:Il centro del gioco degli scacchi, formato dagli scacchi e4, e5, d4 e d5, ha un'importanza strategica eccezionale. Chi h
